name: Rogue Gunner
description:
The Cyber world collapsed. Vicious monsters and creatures unknown took control of the place. It became an arena for challengers to prove their survival skills and fighting abilities. How long can you survive?

Rogue Gunner is a 3D top-down shooting game, with all the hardcore classic arcade elements from the old time such as pixel image and rogue like dungeon. Similar to other shooting games such as the bind of Issac or Nuclear Throne, Rogue Gunner is all about shooting monsters and aliens! Try to dodge bullets and fireball, survive with your limited health, and go down to a deeper level and defeat the boss!

Meet Marty the adventurer; secret agent Laura and mercenary veteran Jason. Each of them has special ability and different strengths. Choose from these 3 stylish heroes to battle with aliens, monsters and robots, collect & upgrade your weapons to blast and kill!

Rogue Gunner: Pixel Shooting Features:
3 heroes and NPC with interesting story lines for you to discover!
Infinite cyber punk style dungeon and self-generated map, you will never enter the same room!
25 monsters and bosses are waiting to fight! We are developing more!
21 Powerful Weapons which can satisfy all your need: shot gun, razer gun, lightening shooter and canons…You can also enchant them with 26 different abilities, such as shield, missile, magic spells and more!
Totally FREE for download.

Cyber World Adventure:
Enter the cyber world and explore. Kill different enemies, look for treasure, avoid traps and in the end, you will meet the boss. Will you become the best shooter?

Cyber Arena
Infinite waves of monsters are coming to you. How many rounds can you survive? Whoever stay in the end win the biggest reward!

Download Rogue Gunner today and explore the cyber world !
